positive.name: Gourmand
positive.description: Obsessed with food, cooks a lot
hooks: They have been working on an amazing new dish, but require a rare spice from a nearby area.
They offer food spiked with psychedelics.

positive.name: Ascetic
positive.description: Has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments, enjoys simplicity

positive.name: Nimble
positive.description: Moves around with ease as if they are dancing

positive.name: Clever
positive.description: They are good at out-of-the-box thinking

positive.name: Open-Minded
positive.description: Doesn't judge people often, will consider even the wildest claims

positive.name: Sanguine
positive.description: Exceptionally upbeat, very difficult to lower their mood

positive.name: Optimist
positive.description: Can always find the silver lining

positive.name: Steadfast
positive.description: Mentally strong and doesn't crumble under stress

positive.name: Brave
positive.description: Shows courage in the face of danger

positive.name: Iron Stomach
positive.description: Has a strong resistance to ingesting contaminants and toxins

neutral.name: Night Owl
neutral.description: Is usually awake at night and asleep during the day

neutral.name: Masochist
neutral.description: Likes being subjected to pain

neutral.name: Transhumanist
neutral.description: Wants to enhance their body through artifice or magic

neutral.name: Tortured Artist
neutral.description: Feels misunderstood by other people, wants to create the greatest piece of art
hooks: They have created some poor quality artwork, but thinks it's a masterpiece, and want it sold to a collector.

neutral.name: Chemical Fascination
neutral.description: Loves altering their mental state with drugs and chemicals, suffers withdrawl quickly
hooks: The local dealer has cut them off, and needs a new supply, or for the dealer to take them back.

neutral.name: Teetotaler
neutral.description: Abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals, doesn't drink or use drugs

neutral.name: Absent-Minded
neutral.description: Will sometimes completely forget what they are doing

neutral.name: Obsessed Worker
neutral.description: Always focused on their job, starts feeling uneasy when not working

neutral.name: Perfectionist
neutral.description: Can't bear to stop stop working on something until it is perfect

neutral.name: Lazy Worker
neutral.description: Hates their job, works slowly and would much rather be doing anything else

neutral.name: Clumsy
neutral.description: Constantly fumbling and dropping things

neutral.name: Fidgiter
neutral.description: Is constantly fiddling with something in their hand

neutral.name: Neat
neutral.description: Their environment must always be clean and tidy

neutral.name: Slob
neutral.description: Doesn't care about the cleanliness of their environment

neutral.name: Animal Lover
neutral.description: Loves animals, and tends to be surrounded by them

neutral.name: Animal Hater
neutral.description: Can't stand animals, and often tries to avoid them

neutral.name: Rebellious
neutral.description: Dislikes authority, and resists any attempt at control over them

neutral.name: Compliant
neutral.description: Always obeys authority, and shows little to no resistance to new rules

neutral.name: Submissive
neutral.description: Meekly obediant to others, and shows no resistance in conflict

neutral.name: Dominant
neutral.description: They must be the loudest voice, have their idea pursued, and be the most powerful in the room

neutral.name: Party Animal
neutral.description: Loves parties, and often tries to organise them

neutral.name: Introvert
neutral.description: Doesn't like too much social interaction, and tends to be timid or blunt in conversation

neutral.name: Snob
neutral.description: Believes that they are of the highest class, and looks down upon those lesser than them

neutral.name: Squeamish
neutral.description: Gets grossed out easily

neutral.name: Drunken Prodigy
neutral.description: Seems to perform better, work better, and just be better while they are drunk

neutral.name: Stoned Prodigy
neutral.description: Seems to perform better, work better, and just be better while they are under the influence of drugs

neutral.name: Hoplophobia
neutral.description: They are terrified of weapons

neutral.name: Hoplophile
neutral.description: Has an irrational love for weaponry

neutral.name: Autophobia
neutral.description: Has a fear of being alone

neutral.name: Indecisive
neutral.description: Struggles to commit to a decision

neutral.name: Hypochondriac
neutral.description: Is constantly concerned with their health, possibly beleieving that they have afflictions that they don't

negative.name: Agoraphobia
negative.description: Is scared of going outside

negative.name: Purist
negative.description: Doesn't like people people who are magically inclined
hooks: They say that one of the other townspeople has had their hand replaced with artifice/magic, and want it taken from them.

negative.name: Greedy
negative.description: Always wants more, and gets mad if they don't get it

negative.name: Jealous
negative.description: If they see something they don't have they do what they need to get it

negative.name: Pyromaniac
negative.description: They love watching and starting fires, and gets angry when they are extinguished
hooks: They want to see the biggest pyre, there is a bandit hideout nearby, and want it set ablaze.

negative.name: Sadist
negative.description: Enjoys inflicting pain on others

negative.name: Wimp
negative.description: Cowers at the slightest notion of violence

negative.name: Abrasive
negative.description: Exceptionally blunt, doesn't consider peoples feelings when talking

negative.name: Creepy Breathing
negative.description: Breathes considerably heavily and sweats constantly

negative.name: Misandrist
negative.description: Dislikes and distrusts men

negative.name: Misogynist
negative.description: Dislikes and distrusts women

negative.name: Misanthrope
negative.description: Dislikes and distrusts people, believes that all actions are taken for selfish reasons

negative.name: Pessimist
negative.description: Always assumes the worst outcome

negative.name: Depressive
negative.description: Perpetually in an awful mood, very difficult to raise their mood

negative.name: Nervous
negative.description: Feels the strain from stress more than others

negative.name: Volatile
negative.description: Even the smallest thing can make them explode, very quick to break under stress

negative.name: Sickly
negative.description: They are far more likely to get sick than others

negative.name: Insomniac
negative.description: Forever tired, they can't seem to get a good nights rest

negative.name: World Weary
negative.description: Well versed in world/country/state politics, but are very anxious about the fallout of world events

negative.name: Desensitized
negative.description: They have seen so many traumatic events that those same events no longer phase them

negative.name: Tycoon
negative.description: Always looking for business opportunities, they want to own it all
